description: I wish to assist you in availing yourself of this world and its considerable resources to achieve the loftiest of your dreams and ambitions.

Your journey towards --/e/Completionist/e/-- will encompass intricate and convoluted factories; manifold magics, alchemies, and bewitchments; resolute explorations in the faces of bounty and menace, spanning thousands of kilometers.

And, with some measure of fortune and fortitude, erecting your --own-- settlement (ostentatious or unaffected?) where you can relax, tea in hand, imbibing the ambience of your preferred biome and relishing (or ruing?) the reach of your dominion.
